sqlMap.select:
SELECT /*FSMB0020.SEARCH00.자산변동관리 조회 처리*/ '0' AS CHEK_YSNO /*선택*/ ,A.CHNG_DATE /*변동일*/ ,A.ASCH_GUBN /*변동구분[ASCH_GUBN]*/ ,CASE WHEN A.CHNG_GUBN='CHNG' THEN '일괄변동' ELSE '' END AS CHNG_GUBN /*일괄변동유무*/ ,A.ASST_NUMB /*자산번호*/ ,B.ASST_NAME /*자산명*/ ,A.SEQN_NUMB /*일련번호*/ ,A.ASST_STAT /*자산상태[ASST_STAT]*/ ,A.DEPT_CODE /*부서코드*/ ,SF_GET_DEPTNAME(A.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_NAME /*부서명*/ ,A.EMPL_NUMB /*사원번호*/ ,SF_GET_EMPLNAME(A.EMPL_NUMB) AS EMPL_NAME /*사원명*/ ,A.ACQU_ENDX /*취득가_기말잔액*/ ,A.DPCT_ENDX /*충당금_기말잔액*/ ,A.UNDP_BALE /*미상각잔액*/ ,A.CHNG_AMOT /*변동금액*/ ,A.DSPS_AMOT /*처분가액*/ ,A.DSPS_GILS /*처분손익*/ ,A.DPCT_GRDC /*충당금가감액*/ ,A.ACCT_INTL /*계정과목코드*/ ,SF_GET_ACCTNAME(A.ACCT_INTL) AS ACCT_NAME /*계정과목명*/ ,A.CUST_CODE /*거래처코드*/ ,SF_GET_CUSTNAME(A.CUST_CODE) AS CUST_NAME /*거래처명*/ ,A.RCGN_YSNO /*승인여부*/ ,A.APPV_DATE /*승인일시*/ ,A.APPR_EMPL /*승인자*/ ,SF_GET_EMPLNAME(A.APPR_EMPL) AS APPV_EMNM /*승인자명*/ ,A.SLIP_NUMB /*전표번호*/ ,A.SLIP_LINE /*전표순번*/ ,A.DESC_REMK /*비고(100)*/ ,C.ASCL_NAME /* 자산 분류명*/ ,C.SMAL_NAME AS CLSF_NAME /*품목분류*/ ,B.ACQS_DATE /*취득일*/ ,B.ASST_STAT AS ASST_STAT2 /*자산상태2[ASST_STAT]*/ ,B.ACCT_UNIT /*회계단위*/ ,E.REF1_FILD /*자산처리단위*/ ,A.VATX_AMNT /*부가세액*/ FROM FS_ASCHXM A INNER JOIN FS_ASSTXM B ON A.ASST_NUMB = B.ASST_NUMB INNER JOIN VI_ASSETCLASS C ON B.CLSF_CODE = C.SMAL_CODE INNER JOIN TM_CODEXD E ON A.ASCH_GUBN = E.COMD_CODE AND E.COMM_CODE = 'ASCH_GUBN' AND E.REF1_FILD != 'MOVE' AND E.REF1_FILD = 'ASCH' /*ASCH(변동)인 항목만 표시*/ WHERE A.CHNG_DATE >= #CHNG_DAT1# /*조회 시작일*/ AND A.CHNG_DATE <= #CHNG_DAT2# /*조회 종료일*/
A.ASCH_GUBN = NVL(#ASCH_GUBN#, A.ASCH_GUBN) /*변동구분*/
A.RCGN_YSNO = NVL(#RCGN_YSNO#, A.RCGN_YSNO) /*승인여부*/
B.CLSF_CODE = NVL(#CLSF_CODE#, B.CLSF_CODE) /*품목분류*/
A.ASST_NUMB = NVL(#ASST_NUMB#, A.ASST_NUMB) /*자산번호*/
A.DEPT_CODE = NVL(#DEPT_CODE#, A.DEPT_CODE) /*부서코드 파레메터 CHBF_DEPT를 DEPT_CODE로 변경*/
ORDER BY A.CHNG_DATE DESC
